description: Longest edge a of smallest (measured by the longest edge) primitive Euler bricks (a, b, c, sqrt(a^2 + b^2), sqrt(b^2 + c^2), sqrt(a^2 + c^2) are integers).
references: Ruslan Sharipov, A note on invertible quadratic transformations of the real plane, arXiv preprint arXiv:1507.01861, 2015
links: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3556
